short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Most efficient way to take & share time-stamped notes while watching videos!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
YiNote can help you easily save your ideas with online videos, and provide smooth note taking experience! 

Details:

In-page notes taking and reviewing for videos
- Save time-stamped notes while watching online video
- Quick access to interested video time by clicking note
- Notes are always stay with video in page for easy review

Manage all video notes in one place
- Bookmark your noted videos
- Search notes and videos by keywords
- Always keep new note on top of list
